level.heading: Schedule I tests.
level.text: The Mayor shall place a substance in Schedule I if the Mayor finds that the substance:
Has high potential for abuse; and
Has no accepted medical use in treatment in the United States or in the District of Columbia or lacks accepted safety for use in treatment under medical supervision.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-29, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 48-901.02.
